verses.roman:
saṅkṣepato mayoktāni
sapta-manvantarāṇi te
bhaviṣyāṇy atha vakṣyāmi
viṣṇoḥ śaktyānvitāni ca

synonyms: saṅkṣepataḥ—in brief; mayā—by me; uktāni—explained; sapta—seven; manu-antarāṇi—changes of Manu; te—unto you; bhaviṣyāṇi—the future Manus; atha—also; vakṣyāmi—I shall speak; viṣṇoḥ—of Lord Viṣṇu; śaktyā anvitāni—empowered by the energy; ca—also.
translation: I have briefly explained to you the position of the seven Manus. Now I shall describe the future Manus, along with the incarnations of Lord Viṣṇu.
